channel.title: Basic stuff :s- Npc talk with separate options? (PI)
channel.description:
K i'm using exion/ a PI base, i've got the npc spawned, i have no idea how i'm meant to get the npc to open up the dialogue box to start, and how would i make separate options that would teleport to 2 different locations
Eg.
Talk to npc First line Choose one of the cities below to join Falador ( Teleports to falador & adds a 'falador = 1' in the player save? ) Varrock ( The same but for varrock) ^ how would i go about doing this? thanks, jeddac.
